Haste
{3}{R}: Monstrosity 2. [i](If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Many believe life began on Azgol when the Ashen Idol struck the earth with a bolt of lightning, energizing the land and giving it divine purpose.[/i]
